data.title: Bad news
data.text: The place was only half full and it took over 15 minutes to be seated. After being seated we waited over 45 minutes to place drink orders. After waiting another 15 minutes we cancelled the order and left. On the way out I politely complained to the Manager who had no concern about it. The bartenders and serving staff feel that they are there just to chat with each other. Stay away from this place

data.title: Consistently good!
data.text: In town on business and stayed across the street at the Marriot City Ctr so it was very convenient. The day we got in the Panther's football team was playing at the stadium but we wanted to watch the Patriots game. After going to a couple sports bars and being told "no, we don't have the Patriots game on any of our TV's" we headed back to Hooters and figured we would just have a drink close to our hotel. When we arrived Amber (our waitress) said, "oh follow me!" She sat us at a table and put the patriots game on the tv where we were sitting. The food and drinks were awesome, as always and the atmosphere was friendly and fun.

data.title: It was fine
data.text: Nothing great nothing bad.  I do have to say it was nice that the manager stopped by.  She was very nice.  Very slow restaurant.  Wings were a little greasy, bartender okay, a little pre-occupied.  Convenient location.

data.title: Late Night Snack
data.text: We came back from a wedding and reception and I was still starving. We were staying at the Marriott, so there ya go, right across the street.  I got a bunch of wings to go and had a beer while waiting.  It only took 15 minutes or so, and we walked back to the hotel and feasted on the best wings around.  Next time I'm around, I'll definitely stop in there.

data.title: Unplanned stop
data.text:
We were early for a baseball game so we stopped in for lunch. 
Very few people in the place. We were seated pretty quickly and ordered some drinks. 
We ordered a bunch of appetizers. It ok about 20 minutes to get the food. All of it was delivered. Nothing special tasting to talk about, pretty average.
As I said we were on our way to the game so when we finished we wanted the check. Our waitress was nowhere to be found. The only staff in the place was the bartender. After waiting about 15 minutes our waitress showed up and we got or check and paid. 
Overall service was average, food was average and the girls working were average at best.

data.title: Worst restaurant experience in a long time
data.text:
My dad and I were in Charlotte to see a baseball game at BB&T ballpark nearby. We originally were going to eat somewhere else but they didn't start serving until 5pm and we arrived around 4:30. Hooters was right next door so we opted for there as we were on a time crunch. Should have gotten a hint when it was happy hour and there were only 2 people at the bar and one other table in the whole restaurant. 

Upon entering we were seated right away and given our drinks. My dad ordered the grilled fish tacos and a side salad. I ordered the buffalo chicken tacos and side salad. Salads never came out before but with meal. Once the food arrived, my dads tacos were fried and not grilled. Both of our salads were inedible because of bad lettuce and vegetables. My dad asked for another salad to be made and I asked for onion rings since it was the same price (.99 up charge). After manager made a new salad it was a little better but still not acceptable. After waiting about 8 minutes for the onion rings, they came out and were inedible as well. Full of grease and soggy. Did not even eat one whole piece. Our waitress was more than accommodating while we had these issues. Spoke with manager again and explained what was going on and couldn't eat salads THEN couldn't eat onion rings. They said they would adjust our bill accordingly. 

Once getting the check, they never took anything off. I am not one to accept comps if something goes wrong but after multiple chances to get our food right, we did not expect to pay for a salad that didn't get eaten OR onion rings that were not edible. Also, the manager did not know his menu. When the onion rings were not taken off and then charged us $5, he said they were more expensive to add as a side. It clearly states that you can add a side salad, onion rings, tater tots for a .99 up charge. 

They had already run my dads card when we thought the check was taken care of the first time. Now, it's close to 6pm which is the start of the baseball game we were going to. We had been in the restaurant close to an hour and a half because of this mess. They couldn't figure out how to refund the first transaction and then run the second. When they brought the fixed second check it was still incorrect because they charged a side salad as $2.99 instead of the .99. 

We finally got out of there and will never EVER return. We don't hardly ever go to Hooters establishments and this is just another reason not to go. 

As a positive, tacos were descent and waitress really did try to be positive throughout the whole fiasco. DO NOT GO HERE!!!

data.title: Can't Go Wrong with Happy Owl!
data.text: My wife and I came to this location while visiting Charlotte.  It happened to be the night of the Pacquiao/Bradley fight so they were charging a $10 cover to get in.  Unexpected, but we enjoyed the fight and each received a $10 voucher off a future meal so all is good.  Good drinks, apps, and the wings were delicious as always.  We were seated at our table for a good 3 hours, but our waitress kept our drinks topped off and was attentive as we enjoyed the fight.  I like the vibe of the downtown location alot, and it was really close to our hotel which was a plus.  Will definitely be back next time we're in town.

data.title: It's Hooters, what else do you expect
data.text:
Monday night all you can eat boneless wings, fried pickles, beer and girls with limited clothing.
I'm failing to see why this even requires a review.

data.title: Convenient to the Time/Warner Arena
data.text: Good food, clean, within walking distance of the T/W Arena , it is as down town Charlotte as you can get, but a little slow on the service. The "scenery " was very nice also. Come on, it's a typical Hooters, it's always good!!

data.title: Good service...great locations
data.text: As always, the service was good at Hooters.  The waitress made sure our lunches were delivered timely and also made sure our drinks were filled.

data.title: Hoot(ers) and Holler
data.text: Was in Charlotte on January 24th to see the Panthers play the Cardinals.  The Panthers did an awesome job during that game.  But AFTER the game, the staff at Hooters did an awesome job as well.  Lots of fans there, and they allowed us all to celebrate, get loud and enjoy it without batting an eye.  My sister, her fella, my wife and I shared some amazing wings, and I ordered their Double "D" burger which was GIANORMOUS and more than I could eat alone, so I had to share with my wife.  Again, attentive staff, wonderful food and fantastic environment for those of us who may be a little sports crazy at times.   Can't wait till next season so I can make this a frequent after game regular spot.

data.title: Not even 'okay'..
data.text: My friends and I went here for some food and a drink after work (we are also in the food service industry so for me to write a review like this, takes a lot.) and to say the food was terrible, is an understatement.  The chicken tenders  and the chicken in the quesadilla had a rubber consistency and our beers took forever.  It was later in the evening and the place wasn't exactly full.  So, overall.. The service and the food aren't worth the trip, sorry to say.

data.title: Family
data.text: Just average but the food was good. Location was right for a rainy night. Clean, friendly server, quick service, next time we will try the wings

data.title: Lunch
data.text: I had lunch here 1/4/2016 the food was great, the location is great, the wait time to get a drink or place your order was horrible. 15 minutes after being seated we finally had a server ask for our drink order. The sad thing is they were not busy at all.

data.title: One of the best franchise stores I've ever visited
data.text: This location was clean, quick, and accurate, which are qualities that are lacking in most of their peers around the country. Other locations should take note.

data.title: Mediocre food
data.text: To sum things up: good beer selection, good traditional wings, TVs everywhere to watch sports but don't go for the food or service. The food, other than the wings, all tasted liked it was prefabbed, frozen and then reheated at the restaurant. The service was also far-between and inattentive. Go for a beer and a game but eat beforehand.

data.title: Great stop for lunch.
data.text: Wasn't busy, staff was friendly and efficient, food was good.  Great atmosphere, parking garage that was close was very expensive but there is limited street parking.

data.title: Hooters is Hooters
data.text: Food was average, beer was cold.  Good location.  Wings were tasty, but it's the same restaurant regardless of what state it is in.

data.title: Terrible Service
data.text: Slow service - took 15 minutes to get our drinks after ordering! The beer was so full of foam. The waitress apologized for the slow service because they were "so busy" when more the half the tables were empty! Food was just okay. When the bill came it was incorrect: that took another 10 minutes to fix. I would definitely not return if in the area again.

data.title: More than meets the eye
data.text:
Decided to give it a go as it was handy to the bar next door which was short on seats and we fancied some food. Wasnt really sure what to expect as there is an obvious reputation here and while some of that is realised the truth is that Hooters is a fun easy going place to grab a drink and some eats.
As luck would have it they had a special on for endless chicken bucket and with the typical huge range of sauce options, flavour and level of heat, we dived in.
The staff are lively and fun, really helpful and professional too offering great service without crowding you. 
Overall a good, fun, easy place to grab some decent food at a reasonable price!
